thread.title: très chic & perfect location
thread.title_full: très chic & perfect location - Review of Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: traveler_de
title: très chic & perfect location
text:
stylish hotel in a perfect location. you step out the front door and you are on Rue Saint Honore. walking distance to shopping and main attractions in Paris. rooms and public areas are well appointed and very stylish. perfect mix between modern and classic. hotel is perfect for business and leisure travel.
Room Tip: I was lucky enough to stay in one of their suites. definitely worth paying the extra money. See more room tips
